name: x, y, zed
description:
Please turn on your sound.

Me, you, and the apocalypse, kid. No matter what, I'll always be there for you. I'm your teacher, protector, and friend. You can trust me.
(This is a short game. Please play until the end before rating or commenting. Thanks!)
Originally made for the Gamejolt DreamHack Jam.  You can play the game on Gamejolt here: https://gamejolt.com/games/x-y-zed/286662
Support my work here: https://www.patreon.com/Norbez
My game The Mouse, which explores similar themes to this Twine, can be played here: https://norbez.itch.io/the-mouse
